strings.Value: "Guards! Take her. Send her head to Irovetti as our reply!"

{n}The emblem of {g|Pitax}Pitax{/g} glistens on the messenger's chest. She stands proudly and speaks her words bold and clear:{/n} "Your Highness, {Name} the First! I have a message for you from Irovetti, King of Pitax."
{n}Your guards disarm the screaming messenger and drag her away.{/n}
"I am sorry, Your Highness, but I do not have authority to negotiate. I was only vested with the task of delivering my King's message and receiving your reply."
"I will pass your words to His Highness."
{n}After a low bow, the messenger leaves the throne room.{/n}
